mapper.select: SELECT b.selfintro_id, b.resume_id, b.content, b.title FROM applications a INNER JOIN resume_selfintroductions b ON a.resume_id = b.resume_id WHERE a.status = 'pass' limit 10
mapper.insert: insert into introductions (jobSeeker_id, title, content) VALUES ( #{jobSeekerId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select introduction_id as id, jobseeker_id as jobSeekerId, title as title, content as content, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from introductions where introduction_id = #{id}
